CustomField.description: Run LKL routines for Service Resources on Shift Schedules when the 'Run LKL' flag is turned on.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Run LKL routines for Service Resources on Shift Schedules when the 'Run LKL' flag is turned on. True: When Run_LKL__c is enabled, it will run through the LKL routines for Shift Schedules. False: The LKL routines will skip Shift Schedules.
CustomField.label: Run Shifts
